about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure unlike any other in "Archwillio," a captivating exploration game set on a mysterious and enchanting island. Your mission? To traverse through the lush landscapes of this abandoned yet oddly occupied land, all while hunting down 17 different varieties of fruit scattered across its terrain.

As you step into the shoes of our intrepid explorer, you'll navigate your way using the classic WASD keys, guiding your character through dense foliage, across babbling streams, and over rugged terrain in search of the elusive fruits. But mere movement won't be enough to conquer this island; you'll need to harness the power of sprinting by tapping into your Shift key, enabling you to dash past obstacles and cover ground with newfound agility.

Each fruit you discover brings you one step closer to victory, but it's not just about the destination—it's about the journey. "Archwillio" immerses you in a world brimming with unique atmospheres, from serene sunlit clearings to shadowy groves cloaked in mystery.

You must hone your skills of observation and exploration, uncovering hidden pathways, shortcuts, and cleverly concealed fruits tucked away in the island's nooks and crannies. Every twist and turn of the landscape presents an opportunity, and only the most astute adventurers will uncover all 17 fruits and claim victory.

Yet, as you delve deeper into the heart of the island, a sense of foreboding may begin to creep in. Will you press onward, undeterred by the island's secrets, or will you heed the warning signs and tread cautiously through its tangled depths?

In "Archwillio," the choice is yours. Will you race against the clock, striving for the best time amidst the island's unique atmosphere? Or will you take your time, soaking in the sights and sounds of this captivating world, savoring every moment of your journey through its tenebrous woodlands? Whatever path you choose, one thing is certain: adventure awaits around every corner, and the island's secrets are yours to uncover.

name: ArchWilio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 / Radeon 530
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.6GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030

short_description: Our protagonist finds themselves stranded in a dense forest, desperately seeking your guidance to escape this verdant labyrinth.
